comment: Example of how your ihcsettings.json file can look like. You need this user supplied file to run examples and tests

ihcConfig.comment: Refer to your IHC controller config for endpoint and authentication details. Known application names include 'treeview', 'openapi', 'administrator'

testConfig.comment: ID's of resources that can be used by tests and examples. Get the IDs from IHC Visual by pressing CTRL and hover mouse pointer over suitable input/output (or run IOExtractor project and inspect output)
testConfig.boolOutput1: <ID of an output that may be modified by example or test>

CSharpGenerator.namespace: <Set C# namespace here for generated output>
